Language:

Technical Info:

This is a DVD rip that uses the OGM codec. To play, you may use VLC (http://www.videolan.org/vlc/ ) or MPlayer plus codecs (http://www.mplayerhq.hu/design7/dload.html ). If you wish to use Windows Media Player or other DirectShow players, you must install first an OGM codec like RadLight Ogg Media filter (http://www.free-codecs.com/download/RadLight_Ogg_Media_DirectShow_filter.htm ).


Background:

This is a sort of a late-night reality/gag TV show featuring models dressed in sexy police uniform, wearing short skirts ("minisuka" refers to "miniskirt").

The models are assigned to do various tasks ranging from playing games to doing sexy poses to catching lizards -- anything that makes them accidentally expose their underwear. This is the ultimate upskirts show. ("Upskirt" is "panchira" (????) in Japanese).

As of this writing, there are 13 seasons in all. The first season was shown in 1996.


Content:

This is the 3rd DVD from the 10-DVD Minisuka Police box set. It features the top three best episodes from the third season of the show, plus extras.
